com.davidsoergel.dsutils.collections
Class PermutingCollectionIteratorFactory<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.davidsoergel.dsutils.collections.CollectionIteratorFactory<T>
      com.davidsoergel.dsutils.collections.PermutingCollectionIteratorFactory<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterator<Iterator<T>>
public class PermutingCollectionIteratorFactory<T>
extends CollectionIteratorFactory<T>

A Factory for new Iterators based on a List, where each new Iterator provides the contents in a random order. The shuffling is done in place on the underlying collection.

Version:
$Id$

David Soergel
